    • Method Detail

      • initVision

        public void initVision()
        Called in robot init, starts vision processing. Adds vision camera and field camera. Starts GRIP pipeline and finds two rectangles on target. Calculates distance and angle to centerpoint of target.

      • getAngle

        public double getAngle(double distance,
                       org.opencv.core.Rect rect1,
                       org.opencv.core.Rect rect2)
        Finds the robot's angle between centerline of camera image and centerline of target.
        Parameters:
        rect1 - First rectangle detected from camera input.
        rect2 - Second rectangle detected from camera input.
        Returns:
        angle Robot's angle to the target in radians.

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(org.opencv.core.Rect rect)
        Parameters:
        rect - One of the rectangles on the vision target.
        Returns:
        Distance from camera to target, returned in inches.

      • getHorizontalOffset

        public double getHorizontalOffset(org.opencv.core.Rect rect1,
                                  org.opencv.core.Rect rect2)
        Finds the robot's horizontal offset in inches from the center of the target using the input image from the camera.
        Parameters:
        rect1 - First rectangle detected from camera input.
        rect2 - Second rectangle detected from camera input.
        Returns:
        horizontalOffset Robot's horizontal distance from the target in inches.
